text: Except as otherwise provided in subchapter X of this chapter or Chapter 2 of this title, the only interest of a partner which is transferable shall be partner's transferable interest. The interest of a partner, whether or not transferable, shall be personal property.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

Uniform Law:

This section is based on ยง 701 of the Uniform Limited Partnership Act (2001 Act). See Vol. 6A , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.

DC CODE ยง 29-707.01

subchapter.text: Transferable Interests and Rights of Transferees and Creditors.
